title: Live Classes
text:
Q: How do I update my billing info?
A: Go to Billing Settings and click 'Update Payment Method'.

title: Recorded Lectures
text:
Q: How do I access recorded lectures?
A: Recorded lectures are available in the course dashboard under 'My Lectures'.

title: Doubt Resolution
text:
Q: How can I resolve my doubts?
A: You can ask questions during live classes or post them in the discussion forum.

title: Mock Tests
text:
Q: How do I take mock tests?
A: Mock tests are available in the 'Tests' section of your dashboard. You can take them anytime.

title: Performance Tracking
text:
Q: How can I track my performance?
A: Your performance dashboard shows your progress, attendance, and grades.

title: Peer Interaction
text:
Q: How can I interact with peers?
A: You can join peer-to-peer doubt-solving sessions scheduled weekly.

title: Study Material
text:
Q: Where can I find study materials?
A: Comprehensive study materials are available in the 'Resources' section of your course.

title: Live Doubt Sessions
text:
Q: When are live doubt sessions held?
A: Live doubt sessions are scheduled every Saturday at 5 PM.

title: Course Feedback
text:
Q: How can I provide feedback on the course?
A: You can submit feedback through the 'Feedback' section in your dashboard.
